price: ወደእነዚያ ነፍሶቻቸውን ወደ ሚያጠሩት (የሚያወድሱት) አላየህምን፤ አይደለም፤ አላህ የሚፈልገውን ያጠራል፡፡ የተምር ፍሬ ክር ያህልም አይበደሉም፡፡
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yuzakkūna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakkī man yashāu walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
